Enum.name: LongRangeMode
Enum.description: This bit can be modified only in Sleep mode. A write operation on other device modes is ignored.

Enum.name: AccessSharedReg
Enum.description: This bit operates when device is in Lora mode; if set it allows access to FSK registers page located in address space (0x0D:0x3F) while in LoRa mode.

Value.name: AccessFskRegisterPage
Value.description: Access FSK registers page (in mode LoRa) 0x0D: 0x3F.

Value.name: HighFrequencyMode
Value.description: High Frequency Mode (access to HF test registers).

Value.name: LowFrequencyMode
Value.description: Low Frequency Mode (access to LF test registers).

Register.name: Frf
Register.description: RF Carrier Frequency, Least Significant Bits (of 24 bits).

Register.name: PaConfig
Register.description: PA selection and Output Power control.

Value.name: RfoPin
Value.description: Output power is limited to +14 dBm.

Value.name: PaBoostPin
Value.description: Output power is limited to +20 dBm

Value.name: Level00
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 15 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 2 dBm.

Value.name: Level01
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 14 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 3 dBm.

Value.name: Level02
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 13 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 4 dBm.

Value.name: Level03
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 12 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 5 dBm.

Value.name: Level04
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 11 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 6 dBm.

Value.name: Level05
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 10 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 7 dBm.

Value.name: Level06
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 9 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 8 dBm.

Value.name: Level07
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 8 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 9 dBm.

Value.name: Level08
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 7 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 10 dBm.

Value.name: Level09
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 6 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 11 dBm.

Value.name: Level10
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 5 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 12 dBm.

Value.name: Level11
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 4 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 13 dBm.

Value.name: Level12
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 3 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 14 dBm.

Value.name: Level13
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 2 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 15 dBm.

Value.name: Level14
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm - 1 dBm. If PaBoostPin: 16 dBm.

Value.name: Level15
Value.description: The output power depends on PaSelect. If RfoPin: MaxPower dBm. If PaBoostPin: 17 dBm.

Register.name: PaRamp
Register.description: Control of PA ramp time, low phase noise PLL.

Enum.name: PaRamp
Enum.description: Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_3400_us
Value.description: 3.4 ms Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_2000_us
Value.description: 2 ms Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_1000_us
Value.description: 1 ms Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0500_us
Value.description: 500 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0250_us
Value.description: 250 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0125_us
Value.description: 125 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0100_us
Value.description: 100 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0062_us
Value.description: 62 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0050_us
Value.description: 50 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0040_us
Value.description: 40 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0031_us
Value.description: 31 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0025_us
Value.description: 25 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0020_us
Value.description: 20 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0015_us
Value.description: 15 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0012_us
Value.description: 12 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Value.name: RampTime_0010_us
Value.description: 10 μs Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK.

Enum.name: OcpOn
Enum.description: Enables overload current protection (OCP) for PA.

Register.name: DioMapping1
Register.description: Mapping of pins DIO0 to DIO3.

Register.name: DioMapping2
Register.description: Mapping of pins DIO4 and DIO5, ClkOut frequency.

Enum.name: MapPreambleDetect
Enum.description: Allows the mapping of either Rssi Or PreambleDetect to the DIO pins.

Register.name: Version
Register.description: Semtech ID relating the silicon revision.

Register.name: PaDac
Register.description: Higher power settings of the PA.

Enum.name: PaDac
Enum.description: Enables the +20dBm option on PA_BOOST pin.

Register.name: FormerTemp
Register.description: Stored temperature during the former IQ Calibration.

Number.name: AgcReferenceLevel
Number.description: Sets the floor reference for all AGC thresholds: AGC Reference[dBm]=-174dBm+10*log(2*RxBw)+SNR+AgcReferenceLevel, SNR = 8dB, fixed value.

Number.name: AgcStep1
Number.description: Defines the 1st AGC Threshold.

Number.name: AgcStep2
Number.description: Defines the 2nd AGC Threshold.

Number.name: AgcStep3
Number.description: Defines the 3rd AGC Threshold.

Number.name: AgcStep4
Number.description: Defines the 4th AGC Threshold.

Number.name: AgcStep5
Number.description: Defines the 5th AGC Threshold.

Value.name: Disabled
Value.description: Calibration of the receiver depending on the temperature is disabled.

Value.name: Enabled
Value.description: Calibration of the receiver depending on the temperature enabled.

Enum.name: ImageCalStart
Enum.description: Triggers the IQ and RSSI calibration when set in Standby mode.

Value.name: Start
Value.description: Triggers the IQ and RSSI calibration when set in Standby mode.

Enum.name: ImageCalRunning
Enum.description: Set to {Run} while the Image and RSSI calibration are running. Toggles back to {Idle} when the process is completed.

Value.name: Run
Value.description: Set to this while the Image and RSSI calibration are running.

Enum.name: TempChange
Enum.description: IRQ flag witnessing a temperature change exceeding. TempThreshold since the last Image and RSSI calibration.

Enum.name: TempThreshold
Enum.description: Temperature change threshold to trigger a new I/Q calibration.

Value.name: Monitoring
Value.description: Temperature monitoring done in all modes except Sleep and Standby.

Number.name: Value
Number.description: Temperature Sensor value.

Number.name: Fifo
Number.description: LoRa base-band FIFO data input/output. FIFO is cleared an not accessible when device is in SLEEP mode.

Number.name: FifoTxBaseAddr
Number.description: Write base address in FIFO data buffer for TX modulator.

Number.name: FifoRxBaseAddr
Number.description: Read base address in FIFO data buffer for RX demodulator.

Register.name: FifoRxCurrentAddr
Register.description: Start address of last packet received.

Number.name: Addr
Number.description: Start address (in data buffer) of last packet received.

Value.name: CadDetectedMask
Value.description: Cad Detected Interrupt Mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags.

Value.name: FhssChangeChannelMask
Value.description: FHSS change channel interrupt mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags.

Value.name: CadDoneMask
Value.description: CAD complete interrupt mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags.

Value.name: TxDoneMask
Value.description: FIFO Payload transmission complete interrupt mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags.

Value.name: ValidHeaderMask
Value.description: Valid header received in Rx mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags.

Value.name: PayloadCrcErrorMask
Value.description: Payload CRC error interrupt mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags.

Value.name: RxDoneMask
Value.description: Packet reception complete interrupt mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags.

Value.name: RxTimeoutMask
Value.description: Timeout interrupt mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags.

Value.name: CadDetected
Value.description: Valid Lora signal detected during CAD operation: writing a 1 clears the IRQ.

Value.name: FhssChangeChannel
Value.description: FHSS change channel interrupt: writing a 1 clears the IRQ.

Value.name: CadDone
Value.description: CAD complete: write to clear: writing a 1 clears the IRQ.

Value.name: TxDone
Value.description: FIFO Payload transmission complete interrupt: writing a 1 clears the IRQ.

Value.name: ValidHeader
Value.description: Valid header received in Rx: writing a 1 clears the IRQ.

Value.name: PayloadCrcError
Value.description: Payload CRC error interrupt: writing a 1 clears the IRQ.

Value.name: RxDone
Value.description: Packet reception complete interrupt: writing a 1 clears the IRQ.

Value.name: RxTimeout
Value.description: Timeout interrupt: writing a 1 clears the IRQ.

Number.name: FifoRxBytesNb
Number.description: Number of payload bytes of latest packet received.

Number.name: ValidHeaderCnt
Number.description: Number of valid headers received since last transition into Rx mode. Header and packet counters are reseted in Sleep mode.

Number.name: ValidPacketCnt
Number.description: Number of valid packets received since last transition into Rx mode. Header and packet counters are reseted in Sleep mode.

Enum.name: RxCodingRate
Enum.description: Coding rate of last header received.

Number.name: PacketSnr
Number.description: Estimation of SNR on last packet received. In two’s compliment format mutiplied by 4. Formula: SNR[dB] = PacketSnr[twos complement] / 4.

Number.name: PacketRssi
Number.description: RSSI of the latest packet received (dBm): RSSI[dBm] = -157 + Rssi (using HF output port, SNR >= 0) or RSSI[dBm] = -164 + Rssi (using LF output port, SNR >= 0).

Number.name: Rssi
Number.description: Current RSSI value (dBm): RSSI[dBm] = -157 + Rssi (using HF output port) or RSSI[dBm] = -164 + Rssi (using LF output port).

Enum.name: PllTimeout
Enum.description: PLL failed to lock while attempting a TX/RX/CAD operation.

Value.name: PllDidNotLock
Value.description: Normal mode, a single packet is sent.

Value.name: PllDidLock
Value.description: Continuous mode, send multiple packets across the FIFO (used for spectral analysis).

Enum.name: CrcOnPayload
Enum.description: CRC Information extracted from the received packet header (Explicit header mode only).

Enum.name: FhssPresentChannel
Enum.description: Current value of frequency hopping channel in use.

Enum.name: SpreadingFactor
Enum.description: SF rate (expressed as a base-2 logarithm).

Value.name: NormalMode
Value.description: Normal mode, a single packet is sent.

Value.name: ContinuousMode
Value.description: Continuous mode, send multiple packets across the FIFO (used for spectral analysis).

Enum.name: RxPayloadCrc
Enum.description: Enable CRC generation and check on payload. If CRC is needed, RxPayloadCrcOn should be set: - in Implicit header mode: on Tx and Rx side. - in Explicit header mode: on the Tx side alone (recovered from the header in Rx side).

Number.name: SymbolTimeout
Number.description: RX operation time-out value expressed as number of symbols. Time-out = {SymbolTimeout} * Ts. A value between 0 and 1023.

Number.name: PreambleLength
Number.description: Preamble length MSB, = PreambleLength + 4.25 Symbols.

Number.name: PayloadLength
Number.description: Payload length in bytes. The register needs to be set in implicit header mode for the expected packet length. A 0 value is not permitted.

Number.name: MaxPayloadLength
Number.description: Maximum payload length; if header payload length exceeds value a header CRC error is generated. Allows filtering of packet with a bad size.

Number.name: FreqHoppingPeriod
Number.description: Symbol periods between frequency hops. (0 = disabled). 1st hop always happen after the 1st header symbol.

Register.name: FifoRxByteAddr
Register.description: Address of last byte written in FIFO.

Number.name: FifoRxByteAddrPtr
Number.description: Current value of RX databuffer pointer (address of last byte written by Lora receiver).

Value.name: Enabled
Value.description: Enabled; mandated for when the symbol length exceeds 16ms.

Value.name: Enabled
Value.description: LNA gain set by the internal AGC loop.

Number.name: FreqError
Number.description: Estimated frequency error from modem MSB of RF Frequency Error. Formula: F[error] = ((FreqError x 2^24) / F[xtal]) x (BW[kHz] / 500).

Number.name: RssiWideband
Number.description: Wideband RSSI measurement used to locally generate a random number.

Register.name: InvertIq
Register.description: Invert LoRa I and Q signals.

Enum.name: InvertIq
Enum.description: Invert the LoRa I and Q signals.

Value.name: InvertIq
Value.description: I and Q signals are inverted.

Number.name: SyncWord
Number.description: LoRa Sync Word. Value 0x34 is reserved for LoRaWAN networks.
